Articles.Content:
Hello! I'm NimbleJack3, and I've come to the forums to share my brainpower with the rest of the community. I love to produce air-breathing planes. I don't use any mods, as I find the challenge of working within stock constraints enjoyable in and of itself.

Hopefully I'll be able to contribute here!

I have a couple questions:

  1. How can I set a custom avatar? The option is locked for me.
  2. Are ALL posts moderator filtered? How long does the approval lag take, usually?
  3. Is there such a thing as a Kerbal Space Program mod-manager?

Welcome!

I have a couple questions:

  1. How can I set a custom avatar? The option is locked for me.
  2. Are ALL posts moderator filtered? How long does the approval lag take, usually?
  3. Is there such a thing as a Kerbal Space Program mod-manager?

As to the first and second ones, once you've got 5 posts, you're free to post how you want and change your avatar and stuff. That system's in place to stop spambots. You wouldn't believe how many spam accounts get blocked every day.

As to the third one, yes there is! Kerbal Mod Manager.

Hope you enjoy your stay!

Welcome tot he community NimbleJack3, and it's 3 posts now till you are off the mod queue, so feel free to post and add an avatar

Just click on Settings in the top right, and then Edit Avatar on the left side of the new screen, I recommend you use .png if you want any transparency.
Welcome to the forums, Jack! If you need any help or have any questions about KSP, I may just be able to help, so feel free to PM me anytime!
Thanks for the warm welcome and answers to my questions!
